name: Alone (itch) (MidnightVikingsGames)
description:
Controls:

WASD - Moves

Shift - Sprint

Mouse - Look

Escape - Quit

Stuck alone in purgatory, see how long you can survive the Dark Flesh the hunts you down.

This was made for a local game jam the Games Creation Guild 2019 Halloween Spooky Jam, the jam was over a week but we spent aprox. 1 day building this. We hope you enjoy it regardless.
